ISSUE.TITLE: Missing "Manage stores" ACL rule
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: When you create a Customer as a Vendor and you Modify the ACL to Allow ManageStores then login as the Vendor you can not see this fucntion in the Menu. You need to modify the Sitemap Configuration Node and add ManageStores to the List so that is function can be found :) <siteMapNode SystemName="Configuration" nopResource="Admin.Configuration" PermissionNames="ManageCountries,ManageLanguages,ManageSettings,ManagePaymentMethods,ManageExternalAuthenticationMethods,ManageWidgets,ManageTaxSettings,ManageShippingSettings,ManageCurrencies,ManageACL,ManageEmailAccounts,ManagePlugins,ManageStores" Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/81558/find-bugs-in-nopcommerce-430-rc-and-earn-10#262805
